The BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ macro converts a tuple to an seq.

Usage

BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ(tuple) (v)

or

BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ(size, tuple) (v)

Arguments

size
The size of the tuple to be converted. The argument is ignored.  
tuple
The tuple to be converted.

Remarks

You can invoke the variadic macro (v) as BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ(tuple) or BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ(size,tuple) for backward compatibility.

Requirements

Header:  <boost/preprocessor/tuple/to_seq.hpp>

Sample Code 

#include <boost/preprocessor/tuple/to_seq.hpp>

BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ((a, b, c)) // expands to (a)(b)(c)
